backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profile management and booking-request handling with permission checks using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping deployment-related files, components, and acceptance test IDs for publishing the latest app version.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and deployment documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Step‑by‑step frontend deployment and verification guide including build steps, smoke tests, troubleshooting, and REQ‑11 criteria.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between the marketing page and the admin requests page via simple state.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Comprehensive booking form component handling input state, submission via React Query, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying address, clickable phone/email, and hours using business constants.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and automatic session recovery.
Service showcase section rendering four service cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, and contact details using constants.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with logo, navigation, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports business contact email and phone values as constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookingReques: Fetches all booking requests for admin users using the actor and role checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a query hook to fetch the caller's user role from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBookingReque: Provides a mutation to submit a booking request and invalidates admin request queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRequestsPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks auth and role, displaying booking requests or access messages.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Main marketing page assembling header, hero, services, booking form, contact section, and footer with smooth scrolling and generated asset support.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Utility to generate normalized asset URLs, including helper for generated assets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, business details, and known deployment issues.
